header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: New research findings into getting a good night’s sleep, going camping, getting lost in a city, finding a good route into a city, and discussing a pilot’s flying ability.
header.activity: A couple eating lunch and discussing every day things.

speaker.fls: French -- level unspecified; German -- level unspecified

body.u: erm this guy who had kind of discovered this thing about how you sleep and how your body is and how it relates to earth and erm he was an electrician and erm so when you have got electricity you have to make it go back to the earth you make it ground you go to go you have to connect it to the ground
mm
and so he is kind of old and he is in pain and he noticed how much kind of electricity there just is around you and stuff
right
and he started thinking about it and he was thinking about how humans aren't really connected to the earth they're not connected to the ground
mm
like they used to be yeah because you walk around with shoes that are insulated erm and that you drive places that you are in buildings yeah
mm mm

so your body your feet don't really touch the ground yeah they're insulated from the ground so what he erm because there was all this electricity around he found it out in his bedroom there was a lot of electricity coming from his walls and the appliances and all this kind of stuff
oh
so what he did was he erm created this thing that helped insulate him from erm from from the electricity so he was in a kind of an electricity neutral zone yeah
mm

which he called a grounding mat yeah so this thing helped his body avoid the electricity I think is what they are kind of suggesting and erm after years of being on medication he had to take medication to be able to go to sleep he erm he found out that on the first night that he used this thing he slept without his medication for the first time in years yeah and erm so people did a few more studies into this kind of stuff and the effectiveness of ground mats and stuff erm the same people who are physically not that well and their bodies have got a lot of inflammation in them and you can measure how much inflammation or where the inflammation is by using heat sensors
mm
because your body is inflamed it is giving off heat around these sites yeah
yeah
so they simply had one of those coloured
like infrared or something
those colour vision type

matches

of erm how people look after having you know the th the comparison between before and afters yeah of being grounded and not grounded

and that inflammation goes away so it shows quite a big impact right so I was kind of thinking that since we have been back from our trip and my body's more stiff than it used to be even though we used to move around a lot and do a lot of physical stuff

erm and it made me think when we were travelling we were connected to the ground quite a lot

and we slept on the ground

you don't need it on at night time

well dad used to have this thing when you know when mum was alive that she had so many different appliances in the living room stacked on top of each other

that he'd actually have you know programmed for it for everything to switch off at night

but I still think yeah I think there are in a way too many appliances in this house that are sort of conducting electricity
